title: Mastering the 3 Stages of Game: From Scarcity to Being Chased
caption: false

channel_info.title: Robbie Kramer
channel_info.description:
I'm Robbie Kramer 🎙Host of The Inner Confidence Podcast & Founder of Inner Confidence, Inc.

I lived an exhilarating single life filled with adventures and lessons, and ultimately achieved what I had always aspired to – finding an amazing, feminine, and loving wife. 

I believe my experiences provide a rare balance of wild freedom and committed love, equipping me with the insights to help you navigate the complexities of dating and relationships in today's world. Let me guide you to embrace your desires, improve your social prowess, and ultimately attract the partner who aligns with your highest aspirations.

You won’t find any fluffy, new-age, or cringy stuff here, just tested, proven and actionable advice that yields results.

Apply to join our exclusive Inner Confidence Community of ambitious men who are actively working together to achieve their goals faster   ► https://innerconfidence.com/community

You can email me at robbie@innerconfidence.com with any questions or comments.

transcription: {"text": "There's like three stages of game. Step one is you're just like a beginner and you're in total scarcity. Step two is you're an intermediate. You can get leads, get dates, you know, kind of get laid. And step three happens is when you can get women to actually chase you. It's difficult because obviously the whole game is set up as men as the pursuer. So at some point in the interaction, we've got to go from chasing to being chased. Approaching a woman is by default like that's chasing her, right? You're going up to her, you're chasing her, right? So that it needs to happen after that, where all of a sudden in her mind, it flips from like, oh, this guy's chasing me to, oh, I need to chase this guy. And if you don't give them the opportunity to do it, they'll never do it. And that's the hardest part because, you know, it's all push pull and it's all pull away strategy, right? And the more you push, the more she's like, oh, this guy's just going to like do everything. I don't need to do anything.
